title: Gamma classes and quantum cohomology
abstract: The Gamma-class is a characteristic class for complex manifolds with transcendental coefficients. It defines an integral structure of quantum cohomology, or more precisely, an integral lattice in the space of flat sections of the quantum connection. We present several conjectures (the Gamma-conjectures) about this structure, particularly focusing on the Riemann-Hilbert problem it poses. We also discuss a conjectural functoriality of quantum cohomology under birational transformations.
comment: 18 pages, 1 figure, final version, to appear in the ICM 2022 proceedings (submitted on January 2022)
